title: Fun fact about Sony
body:
For one of my accounting classes in college we were looking at factors of failing businesses. One of our lessons involved the use of "Altman's Z-score"  which is a 4 variable equation that is approximately 72%  accurate in calculating whether a business will become bankrupt in 2 years. Sony's Z-score was around 0.9... aka they are in really bad shape.

You heard it here folks, the makers of play station are in financial trouble and even with their massive success in playstation 4 they are getting killed in most every other area of development. When is the last time you saw someone with a sony TV? Yeah... never (or rarely). 

Just thought I'd share the thoughts of a college professor with you all.
